meeting.text: We've decided to go and talk to your tutor and see what's going on.

meeting2.text: We're going to ask for a meeting for tomorrow.

thanks.text: Not at all darling, we want you to be fine.

thanks2.text: We'll try to have this meeting tomorrow at the latest.

downplay.text: I don't want you to go. It'll be worse.
They'll think I'm a snitch and it wasn't such a big deal.
Let it be, time will fix it.

downplay2.text: Fine, but let us know if goes beyond.

talked2.text: And remember we are visiting grandma on Sunday.
